column3: Economic growth over the past 10 years
Average annual growth in GDP per capita over the past 10 years, i.e. the data for 1980 concerns the average growth 1970-80.
Real GDP per capita (Constant Prices: Laspeyres), taken from the PWT 6.2:
Alan Heston, Robert Summers and Bettina Aten, Penn World Table Version 6.2, Center for International Comparisons of Production, Income and Prices at the University of Pennsylvania, September 2006.
file used: data - data gdp - growth - "PWT rgdpl"
